LanguageData.VAEWaste_Toxafox.label: toxafox
LanguageData.VAEWaste_Toxafox.description: The Toxafox is a highly intelligent fox that has evolved to survive in the harshest of environments. With a keen sense of smell, it is capable of digging up waste packs buried deep underground, making it a persistent pest. Its presence in an area inadvertently generates more pollution, making it a major environmental hazard. Despite its small size, the Toxafox should not be underestimated. Its cunning and adaptability make it a formidable opponent in a world already wracked by toxicity and decay.
LanguageData.VAEWaste_Toxafox.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.VAEWaste_Toxafox.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.VAEWaste_Toxafox.tools.3.label: head
